actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator to reimburse employers for unusual costs incurred in providing on-job training for certain veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to reimburse employers of veteran trainees for unusual costs incurred in providing on-job training for such veterans. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1504 (c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator to reimburse employers for unusual costs incurred in providing on-job training for certain veterans.
